data.title: Burial Sites of Filipino celebrities

FPJ had a stroke, went into a coma for days, and then died. He was laid to rest at the Manila North Cemetery … Burial Sites of Filipino celebrities Read More »
data.text:
LET us take a look at where the famous Filipino celebrities are buried.

Fernando Poe Jr.

The Action King passed away on December 14, 2004, at the age of 65 years old. FPJ had a stroke, went into a coma for days, and then died. He was laid to rest at the Manila North Cemetery in Santa Cruz, Manila.

Nida Blanca

Nida Blanca was brutally killed on November 7, 2001. Her body was found in the backseat of her car in the parking lot of a shopping mall in San Juan. Her husband, a primary suspect in the crime, Rod Strunk, died in an apparent suicide on July 11, 2007, in America. The veteran actress was buried at the Loyola Memorial Park in Marikina.

Rico Yan

At the peak of his career, Rico Yan died on March 29, 2002 while on a vacation with friends in Dos Palmas Resort in Puerto Princesa City. The 27-year-old actor was buried in Manila Memorial Park in Parañaque City.

Francis Magalona

The Master Rapper died on March 6, 2009 at the age of 44 due to acute myeloid leukemia. His ashes were laid to rest at the Loyola Memorial Park in Marikina City.

Rudy Fernandez

The famous actor was already battling pancreatic cancer before his death. He died on June 7, 2008 in his home in Quezon City home. Daboy was 56. His remains buried at The Heritage Park in Taguig City.

Dolphy

The Comedy King or Rodolfo Vera Quizon Sr. in real life passed away at the age of 83 on July 10, 2012. He had multiple organ failure due to chronic obstructive pulmonary disease. He was buried at the Heritage Park in Taguig.

Julie Vega

She was 16 when Julie Vega or Julie Pearl Apostol Postigo died on May 6, 1985 while at the peak of her career. She suffered from cardiac arrest secondary to bronchopneumonia. Julie was buried at the Loyola Memorial Park in Marikina.
